MS.S: VirtualDesktop is a module that provides commandlets to manage virtual desktops of Windows 10 and 11._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* New-Desktop, Switch-Desktop, Remove-Desktop to control desktops_x000D__x000A_* Get-DesktopCount, Get-CurrentDesktop, Get-Desktop and others to query desktops_x000D__x000A_* Move-Window, (Un)Pin-Window, (Un)Pin-Application to control windows on desktops_x000D__x000A_* only Windows 10 2004 and up: Get-DesktopName and Set-DesktopName_x000D__x000A_* only Windows 11: Move-Desktop, Remove-AllDesktops, Set-DesktopWallpaper and Set-AllDesktopWallpapers_x000D__x000A_and other commandlets

# 1.5.1 / 2022-07-29_x000D__x000A_- bug fix: desktop for pinned windows and apps are recognized_x000D__x000A_# 1.5.0 / 2022-03-16_x000D__x000A_- support for Powershell Core_x000D__x000A_- support for Windows Server 2022_x000D__x000A_- support for Windows Terminal_x000D__x000A_# 1.4.1 / 2021-11-27_x000D__x000A_- support for Windows 11 Insider build 22449 and up_x000D__x000A_- version 1.3.2 should have been 1.4.0, so this is 1.4.1_x000D__x000A_# 1.3.2 / 2021-10-22_x000D__x000A_- support for Windows 10 21H2 and Windows 11_x000D__x000A_- Set-DesktopName works on current virtual desktop if parameter -desktop is missing_x000D__x000A_# 1.3.1 / 2021-02-28_x000D__x000A_- fixes for Get-DesktopIndex_x000D__x000A_# 1.3.0 / 2020-11-28_x000D__x000A_- compatible to Powershell Core 7.0 (but not 7.1 or up)_x000D__x000A_- parameter -PassThru for Set-DesktopName (by sirAndros)_x000D__x000A_# 1.2.0 / 2020-06-27_x000D__x000A_- support for desktop names introduced with Win 10 2004_x000D__x000A_- new functions Get-DesktopList, Get-DesktopName and Set-DesktopName_x000D__x000A_- desktop name as parameter for many functions_x000D__x000A_- support for verbose output_x000D__x000A_# 1.1.0 / 2019-09-04_x000D__x000A_- new function Find-WindowHandle_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.1 / 2019-08-22_x000D__x000A_- Fixed examples_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.0 / 2019-06-03_x000D__x000A_- First stable release (hope so)

VirtualDesktop is a module that provides commandlets to manage virtual desktops of Windows 10 and 11._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* New-Desktop, Switch-Desktop, Remove-Desktop to control desktops_x000D__x000A_* Get-DesktopCount, Get-CurrentDesktop, Get-Desktop and others to query desktops_x000D__x000A_* Move-Window, (Un)Pin-Window, (Un)Pin-Application to control windows on desktops_x000D__x000A_* only Windows 10 2004 and up: Get-DesktopName and Set-DesktopName_x000D__x000A_* only Windows 11: Move-Desktop, Remove-AllDesktops, Set-DesktopWallpaper and Set-AllDesktopWallpapers_x000D__x000A_and other commandlets

# 1.5.1 / 2022-07-29_x000D__x000A_- bug fix: desktop for pinned windows and apps are recognized_x000D__x000A_# 1.5.0 / 2022-03-16_x000D__x000A_- support for Powershell Core_x000D__x000A_- support for Windows Server 2022_x000D__x000A_- support for Windows Terminal_x000D__x000A_# 1.4.1 / 2021-11-27_x000D__x000A_- support for Windows 11 Insider build 22449 and up_x000D__x000A_- version 1.3.2 should have been 1.4.0, so this is 1.4.1_x000D__x000A_# 1.3.2 / 2021-10-22_x000D__x000A_- support for Windows 10 21H2 and Windows 11_x000D__x000A_- Set-DesktopName works on current virtual desktop if parameter -desktop is missing_x000D__x000A_# 1.3.1 / 2021-02-28_x000D__x000A_- fixes for Get-DesktopIndex_x000D__x000A_# 1.3.0 / 2020-11-28_x000D__x000A_- compatible to Powershell Core 7.0 (but not 7.1 or up)_x000D__x000A_- parameter -PassThru for Set-DesktopName (by sirAndros)_x000D__x000A_# 1.2.0 / 2020-06-27_x000D__x000A_- support for desktop names introduced with Win 10 2004_x000D__x000A_- new functions Get-DesktopList, Get-DesktopName and Set-DesktopName_x000D__x000A_- desktop name as parameter for many functions_x000D__x000A_- support for verbose output_x000D__x000A_# 1.1.0 / 2019-09-04_x000D__x000A_- new function Find-WindowHandle_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.1 / 2019-08-22_x000D__x000A_- Fixed examples_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.0 / 2019-06-03_x000D__x000A_- First stable release (hope so)
